# ThirdParty

#-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
# limine
#-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
set(LIMINE_PATH ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/limine PARENT_SCOPE)

#-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
# stivale
#-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
add_library(stivale INTERFACE)
target_include_directories(stivale INTERFACE stivale)
